ygData.subject: New poll for shadowknight
ygData.msgSnippet: Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the shadowknight group: I have been playing an SK since EQ went online.  Leveling characters has gotten
ygData.messageBody:
Enter your vote today! A new poll has been created for the
shadowknight group:

I have been playing an SK since EQ went
online. Leveling characters has gotten
easier and easier over time with
imroved tradeskills, focus effects,
revisions to the combat tables,
filtration of items down through the
economy, etc. Do you think:

o this has made playing an SK too easy, I long for the old days.
o SK's will rule no matter what Verant does to the game.
o it is about the right difficulty now, SK's rule the high-end game now.
o it is still too hard, the Orcs in East Commons still kick my butt everytime I come by.
o ...what? This list still EXISTS?!?!?


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/shadowknight/surveys?id=1098051

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups
web site listed above.

Thanks!
